convertRules:
# have fun converting!
'def |' -> 'Definition |\n\n: '

'prop |' -> '**Proposition |**: '
'lem |' -> '**Lemma |**: '
'theo |' -> '**Theorem |**: '

'rem |' -> '**Remark**: |'
'obj |' -> '**Objection**: |'
'rpy |' -> '**Reply**: |'

# Selection Insert Rules
'"'  -> '"' + '"'
'<'  -> '<' + '>'
'~'  -> '~' + '~'
